mapper.select: SELECT A.MENU_CODE , A.MENU_NAME , A.MENU_BRAND , A.MENU_PRICE , A.MENU_RANK FROM TBL_BURGER_MENU A

SELECT A.MENU_CODE , A.MENU_NAME , A.MENU_BRAND , A.MENU_PRICE , A.MENU_RANK , A.CATEGORY_CODE FROM TBL_BURGER_MENU A
WHERE A.MENU_CODE LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
WHERE A.MENU_BRAND LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
WHERE A.MENU_PRICE LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
WHERE A.MENU_RANK LIKE '%' || #{value} || '%'
ORDER BY A.MENU_CODE DESC
